pull.title: [0.13] backport: Treat high-sigop transactions as larger rather than rejecting them
pull.body: This submission includes the patch from #8365 to treat high-sigop transactions as larger instead of rejecting them, for 0.13.

events.body:
utACK 3f65ba2b3bd6c4e269f8f89b16d386b443431693
This should have been backported already.

Nit: Can you format the cherry pick like the other backports? I.e. include
where it came from?

May I ask why it wasn't integrated in the meantime?

Sorry @MarcoFalke, will do so next time!
